Title: Nick Greenhill
Text:
Gaffer Gamgee is sure to know which hobbits have the best stories to tell of Bilbo's disappearance and his adventures and whereabouts since then.

Return to Gaffer after speaking to all of the hobbits.

Nick Greenhill has agreed to share a story about Bilbo Baggins and his adventures.
CompleteText: Oh, youâ€™re wondering what Mad Baggins has been up to? Hah! He was all cleverness and no sense, if you ask me. I know a right amusing story of what mischief he's gotten himself into, I surely do.
